dcterms:creator: P. Arbelaez
C. Fowlkes
D. Martin
dcterms:description: The Berkeley Segmentation Dataset is a benchmark dataset for evaluating segmentation algorithms, providing a collection of images and ground truth segmentations.
dcterms:title: Berkeley Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: S.S. Bukhari
F. Shafait
T.M. Breuel
dcterms:description: The Document Analysis Systems Dataset is used for the segmentation of curled textlines using active contours, providing images of documents with textlines.
dcterms:title: Document Analysis Systems Dataset

dcterms:creator: S.S. Bukhari
F. Shafait
T.M. Breuel
dcterms:description: The Coupled Snakelets Dataset is utilized for curled text-line segmentation from warped document images, focusing on the application of coupled snakelets.
dcterms:title: Coupled Snakelets Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Li
T. Shen
M. Smith
I. Fujiwara
D. Vavylonis
X. Huang
dcterms:description: The Automated Actin Filament Segmentation Dataset provides images for the segmentation, tracking, and measurement of actin filaments using open active contour models.
dcterms:title: Automated Actin Filament Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Li
T. Shen
D. Vavylonis
X. Huang
dcterms:description: The Actin Filament Tracking Dataset is used for tracking actin filaments based on particle filters and stretching open active contour models.
dcterms:title: Actin Filament Tracking Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Ming
H. Li
X. He
dcterms:description: The Connected Contours Dataset introduces a new contour completion model that respects the closure effect, providing images for contour completion tasks.
dcterms:title: Connected Contours Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Ren
C.C. Fowlkes
J. Malik
dcterms:description: The Scale-Invariant Contour Completion Dataset is used for training models to recover missing contours and obtain closed contours using available edge fragments.
dcterms:title: Scale-Invariant Contour Completion Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Ren
C.C. Fowlkes
J. Malik
dcterms:description: The Probabilistic Models for Contour Completion Dataset is used for learning probabilistic models for contour completion in natural images.
dcterms:title: Probabilistic Models for Contour Completion Dataset

dcterms:creator: M.B. Smith
H. Li
T. Shen
X. Huang
E. Yusuf
D. Vavylonis
dcterms:description: The Cytoskeletal Filaments Dataset provides images for the segmentation and tracking of cytoskeletal filaments using open active contours.
dcterms:title: Cytoskeletal Filaments Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
A. Narayanaswamy
B. Roysam
dcterms:description: The 4-D Open-Curve Active Contour Dataset is used for automated tree structure extraction from stacks of 3-D images.
dcterms:title: 4-D Open-Curve Active Contour Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
A. Narayanaswamy
C.L. Tsai
B. Roysam
dcterms:description: The 3-D Neuron Tracing Method Dataset provides images for a broadly applicable 3-D neuron tracing method based on open-curve snake.
dcterms:title: 3-D Neuron Tracing Method Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Xu
J.L. Prince
dcterms:description: The Gradient Vector Flow Dataset is used for edge detection and shape analysis, providing images for evaluating gradient vector flow methods.
dcterms:title: Gradient Vector Flow Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Xu
H. Li
T. Shen
N. Ojkic
D. Vavylonis
X. Huang
dcterms:description: The Actin Networks Dataset provides images for the extraction and analysis of actin networks based on open active contour models.
dcterms:title: Actin Networks Dataset
